game.name: Reclaim! Azhe-giiwewining
game.shortDescription: Embark on an adventure where every word brings you closer to home! As Miskwaa, forge a path through a forest teaming with spirits, stories, and intricate puzzles inspired by Ojibwe culture and language in this all-new point and click adventure.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on an adventure where every word brings you closer to home! As Miskwaa, forge a path through a forest teaming with spirits, stories, and intricate puzzles inspired by Ojibwe culture and language in this all-new point and click adventure.
